variable.name: FSASDATE
variable.description: Form date as SAS date value

variable.name: FORM
variable.description: DCCT form number

variable.name: DHB1
variable.description: Family member is asked: purpose of the DCCT

variable.name: DHB2
variable.description: Family member is asked: how insulin is used in standard group

variable.name: DHB3
variable.description: Family member is asked: how insulin is used in experimental group

variable.name: DHB4
variable.description: Family member is asked: what is the meaning of randomization

variable.name: DHB5
variable.description: Family member is asked: strong treatment preference for (patient's name)

variable.name: DHB6
variable.description: Family member is asked: will you support patient's decision

variable.name: DHB7A
variable.description: Family member is asked about advantage for patient: expectations of blood sugar levels

variable.name: DHB7B
variable.description: Family member is asked about advantage for patient: expectations of complications

variable.name: DHB7C
variable.description: Family member is asked about advantage for patient: expectations of general well-being

variable.name: DHB8
variable.description: Ask family member about frequency of clinic visits in standard group

variable.name: DHB9
variable.description: Ask family member about frequency of clinic visits in experimental group

variable.name: DHB10
variable.description: Family member understands potential problems with giving priority to study

variable.name: DHB11
variable.description: Family member's attitude about insulin pump

variable.name: DHB12
variable.description: Family member's attitude about blood glucose monitoring

variable.name: DHB13
variable.description: Family member's attitude about urine glucose monitoring

variable.name: DHB14
variable.description: Family member's attitude about glucose monitoring in public

variable.name: DHB15
variable.description: Family member's attitude about identifying (patient's name) as diabetic in public

variable.name: DHB16
variable.description: Ask if family member could help if subject became ill

variable.name: DHDAD
variable.description: Person who answered questions: subject's father

variable.name: DHMOM
variable.description: Person who answered questions: subject's mother

variable.name: DHGUARD
variable.description: Person who answered questions: subject's guardian

variable.name: DHSPOUSE
variable.description: Person who answered questions: subject's spouse

variable.name: DHSIBLNG
variable.description: Person who answered questions: subject's sibling

variable.name: DHCHILD
variable.description: Person who answered questions: subject's child

variable.name: DHRELATV
variable.description: Person who answered questions: subject's other relative

variable.name: DHFRIEND
variable.description: Person who answered questions: subject's friend

variable.name: MASK_PAT
variable.description: Patient ID number
